data.title: ok we have established my love of asian food
data.text: I have been coming here for years and years.  It is a bit of a hole in the wall but the food is so yummy.  the lunch special is well worth the cost and if you want something a bit more exotic you can ask to see the "other" menu.  typically this is only on the dinner service.  you can get real Asian food that is prepared well and to the taste of the culture not the Americanized version of Asian food.  the proprietor is from Vietnam and can cook well.  The other thing so good about this place is the tea.  it is very strong and sooooo good.  drop in and have the lunch or live adventurously and go for diner and get something you cant name.

data.title: Fast Service, Friendly Staff
data.text: This restaurant, virtually unchanged in the past ten years or more, is a great place to go for inexpensive Chinese food.  It is economical to eat here - generous amounts of food at low prices...and the service is fast and friendly.

data.title: Good food at a great price. Friendly staff.
data.text:
My friend and I ate dinner at the Golden Wok on a Sunday evening. This was my first time at Golden Wok, and I had the Hunan Shrimp with hot and sour soup and steamed rice. Our server was very accommodating and brought extra sauces for my friend, since she remembers him from other visits. Really enjoyed the hot and sour soup, since I have had it at other restaurants and found it tasted too much of vinegar. The Golden Wok served a much better soup than many other places I've eaten.

The only complaint I would have is that my dish could have used more seasoning, but then I didn't add the sauces the server provide. That's my own mistake.

data.title: Not the best in Town
data.text: I will say it is a below average place for fast food chinese, frozen meals from Sam's taste much better than the lunch mean I ordered!

data.title: Great food! Terrible language barrier!
data.text: I love their food :) absolutely amazing! The language barrier left me feeling my customized order wouldn't come out correct. But it did and it was perfect!! Building looks a bit unkept from the outside and I have seen sandals being worn in the kitchen when going thru the drive thru.

data.title: Not bad food
data.text: The staff is friendly. There's nice variety of menu choices including some Vietnamese dishes. The booths are getting a little used looking. Prices are reasonable. They deliver and there is also a  drive through. At lunch there is a choice of soup and also an egg roll or crab rangoon. drive through or get  delivery is extra cost for these items. All and all decent food. Nothing fancy.
